publicLayout.mainTitle: Administrative panel for mobile application management

modal.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
modal.content: The session will be terminated, you will be transferred to the authorization screen.

common.title: Name
common.imagesDesc: Loading an image (jpg, png) with a resolution of {{width}}x{{height}}, weighing no more than {{size}}mb.
common.heading: Heading

forgotPassword.title: Password recovery
forgotPassword.paragraph: Enter the email address you used to register and we'll send you password change instructions.

success.successForgot: If this email address was used to create your account, you will be sent instructions on how to reset your password. Please check your email.

error.errorAccount: We couldn't find an account that matches the username and password you entered. Please check your username and password and try again.
error.errorForgotNonExist: Email address not found. Please check your entry and try again.

invitation.title: Invitation to the system
invitation.paragraph: {{name}}, You were invited to the system by email {{email}}. To complete the account creation, you need to come up with a password.

modal.errorPassword: The password length should be 8-20 characters, contain numbers, letters of the Latin alphabet in lowercase and uppercase.

recovery.paragraph: Your password reset request has expired or the link has already been used.

invitation.paragraph: Your invitation has expired or the link has already been used.

operationSuccess.paragraph: Now you can log in with your new password.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.delete: The notification will be permanently deleted.

modal.content: The employee will be denied access to the system and disappear from the list of employees of the admin panel.

points.title: Full access
points.content: Can view and change all system parameters.

alerts.accessRule: Select at least one access right.

modal.content: Make sure that the period of display and other data of the banner are set correctly. The banner is automatically published and hidden based on the start and end dates.

matches.title: Matching
matches.sendPush: PUSH about the start of ticket sales
matches.titleModal: Are you sure you want to send?
matches.contentModal: PUSH notification about the sale of tickets for this match will be seen by all users of the mobile application.

create.employee: An email has been sent to the employee's email address with instructions on how to complete the registration.
create.role: The role has been successfully created.

update.invitation: An email with instructions on how to complete registration has been resent to the employee's email address.

delete.employee: The employee is denied access to the system and excluded from the list of employees. To cancel the action, contact your system administrator.

errorAccess: Insufficient rights to perform the action.
successExport: The file has been successfully saved to your device.

validations.noWriteRoleAccess: Action is impossible. No rights to read roles.
validations.maxLimitBanners: Select a banner space that is not occupied for the specified period.
validations.maxLengthExceededLocal: The used word is too long.
validations.invalidName: The letters A-z or A-z are allowed. The maximum number of words cannot exceed {{count}}. The maximum number of characters in a word cannot exceed {{count}}.
validations.maxLengthExceeded: The maximum number of characters cannot exceed {{max}}.
validations.minLengthLess: The minimum number of characters must be greater than {{min}}.
validations.invalidPassword: The password length should be {{min}} - {{max}} characters, contain numbers, letters of the Latin alphabet in lowercase and uppercase.
validations.dateMustBeGreaterThenCurrentMoment: The date and time of sending cannot be past
validations.dateChangeNotificationError: You cannot change a notification that has already been sent.
validations.dateDeleteNotificationError: You cannot delete a notification that has already been sent.
validations.filtersError: The values used are invalid in the search string.
validations.filtersSizeError: The maximum number of characters in the search string has been exceeded.
validations.invalidEndPublish: The end date of the publication cannot be earlier than the current date
